evidence.claim: RetireEASE utilizes AWS services for cloud infrastructure including Lambda and S3.
The platform is compliant with HIPAA regulations, enabling safe handling of health information.
RetireEASE employs FHIR APIs to facilitate health data exchange with EHR systems.
EDI X12 transaction sets are supported for billing and claims processing.
Webhooks are utilized for integrating with third-party applications in real-time.

icp.icp_reason: Utilizes X12 EDI Transactions for healthcare interoperability, indicating strong alignment with API-first needs.
matched_use_cases: Integration with healthcare providers and payers
